headline: Michael Mahoney Turned Boston Scientific Into A Medical Tech Empire
summary: Michael Mahoney's grandfather was a cardiac surgeon — so his first career plan was to become a doctor. Mahoney didn't give up — he adjusted.

headline: Boston Scientific plans changes to expected $200M tariff hit as situation shifts
summary: The company also shared more details of its exit from the TAVR market and the impact of FDA layoffs on product review times.
